name: Ms.Kiruthika J
department: Dept. of Applied Mathematics & Computational Sciences, PSG College of Technology, Coimbatore, Tamilnadu, India.
qualifications: B.C.A  - Bharathiar University   - 2005M.C.A  - Anna University   - 2008Ph.D  ( Faculty of Scienece and Humanities )  - Anna University Supervisor: Dr. Shina Sheen
in_brief: J. Kiruthika has over 10 years of academic experience and currently holds the position of Assistant Professor(Senior Grade) in the Department of Applied Mathematics and Computational Sciences. She is currently pursing her PhD and her research interests include Network Security Analytics.

publications.journal: International Journal of Security and Networks
publications.title: Dynamic deception-based technique for crypto-ransomware detection
